Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back SAVE $1807 PER FAMILY FAMILY PACKAGE View gallery / Back Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six - Pool Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six - Kids Corner Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six - Coconut Bar Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six - Pallas Greek Taverna Bali Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six &vert; Return flights • 7 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six Centrally located in the heart of the island’s most vibrant scene, wander just five minutes from the resort and you’ll find yourself on the golden sands of Seminyak Beach. The expansive, four-tiered swimming pool is the centre piece of the resort, with its own beach lined area with colourful beach loungers and umbrellas. The swim-up Sunken Pool Bar is a hive of social activity that offers refreshing signature cocktails, a tantalising menu and daily events including nightly bingo. A large lobby area with bar and is on offer as well as a guest cinema - ideal after a busy day of shopping or lazing by the pool. View more View less 7 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 1929 per person family share (based on a family of 2 adults & 2 children 2-11 yrs) Flying with Air New Zealand SAVE $1807 PER FAMILY FAMILY PACKAGE Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali Add $150 per adult/ $113 per child return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport Return airport to hotel transfers 7 nights accommodation Daily buffet breakfast 1 x Bucket of Beers to be shared 1 x 2 Course Set Menu Lunch at the Beach Restaurant (Food only) 1 x Set Menu Dinner at Pallas Greek Taverna Restaurant at Blu-Zea Resort ( Food only) 15% Discount on all treatments at The Spa 20% off from total bill at The Beach Restaurant Wi-Fi Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Superior Connecting Room The Superior Connecting Rooms at Blu-Zea Resort by Double-Six offer comfort and convenience for families or groups, featuring modern amenities and easy access between two adjoining rooms. Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until 4pm on 14 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Advertised package prices are based on return Economy Class airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch to Bali. Flights from Wellington or Christchurch go via Auckland. A surcharge of NZD$25 per person applies to any outbound flight on a Friday or Saturday or inbound on a Saturday or Sunday. • Any additional nights accommodation required due to flight schedules are at the customers expense • Min/max stays apply. Family share is based on 2 adults and 2 children ages 2-11 years old sharing a room using existing bedding. Bedding configurations may vary. • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply. Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash. • Neypi Day: Note that no check-in or check-out is permitted on Neypi Day from 6:00am on 19 Mar 26 until 6:00am on 20 Mar 26 • Advertised prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply • Full payment is required at time of booking • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferrable and name changes are not permitted. Airfares and accommodation are limited and subject to availability at time of booking • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
